mapper.select: select * from lecture_note where user_idx=#{user_idx} and lecture_idx=#{lecture_idx}
select * from lecture_review where lecture_idx=#{lecture_idx} order by review_date desc
mapper.insert: insert into lecture_review values( lecture_review_idx.nextval, #{review_title}, #{review_content}, #{review_score}, sysdate, #{user_idx}, #{lecture_idx} )
mapper.update: update lecture set lecture_like=lecture_like+1 where lecture_idx=#{lecture_idx}
update lecture set lecture_like=lecture_like-1 where lecture_idx=#{lecture_idx}
update lecture set lecture_hate=lecture_hate+1 where lecture_idx=#{lecture_idx}
update lecture set lecture_hate=lecture_hate-1 where lecture_idx=#{lecture_idx}
mapper.delete: delete from lecture_like where user_idx=#{user_idx} and lecture_idx=#{lecture_idx}
delete from lecture_hate where user_idx=#{user_idx} and lecture_idx=#{lecture_idx}
